text: AT&T offers pre-paid and post-paid mobile services in the United States through its Wireless segment. AT&T, Inc. provides telecommunications services in the United States and internationally.

Vodafone UK offers pre-paid and post-paid mobile services in the United Kingdom. Vodafone UK is a subsidiary of the multimational telecommunications company Vodafone Group Plc, with a significant footprint in Europe, Asia, Middle East, and Africa.

Movistar is a fixed broadband service operated in Spain by Telefónica de Espa¤a, a subsidiary company of Telefónica, a multinational telecommunications company that also operates in many Latin American countries.

Orange France offers pre-paid and post-paid mobile services in France. Orange France is a subsidiary of Orange S.A., (formerly France T‚l‚com S.A.), a French multinational telecommunications corporation.

Telcel is a Mexican wireless telecommunications company offering pre-paid and post-paid mobile services in Mexico. Telcel is owned by América Móvil, S.A.B. de C.V., a multinational telecommunications company also headquartered in Mexico which operates in 18 countries in the Americas and seven in Europe.

MTN South Africa offers pre-paid and post-paid mobile services in South Africa. It is a subsidiary of MTN Group, a South Africa-based multinational mobile telecommunications company, operating in many African, European and Asian countries.

Airtel India offers pre-paid and post-paid mobile services across India. Airtel India is a subsidiary of Bharti Airtel Limited, a global telecommunications services company based in New Delhi that operates in 18 countries across South Asia and Africa.
Celcom offers pre-paid and post-paid mobile services in Malaysia.  It is a subsidiary of Axiata Group Berhad, a multinational telecommunications conglomerate operating across Asia.

Etisalat UAE offers pre-paid and post-paid mobile services in the United Arab Emirates. Etisalat UAE is a subsidiary of Emirates Telecommunications Corporation, a multinational UAE based telecommunications services provider.

Ooredoo Qatar offers pre-paid and post-paid mobile services in Qatar. It is a subsidiary of Ooredoo Q.S.C. (formerly Qtel), an international telecommunications company headquartered in Doha, Qatar with operations across the Middle East, North Africa, and Asia..
